cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I shine in the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I keep Earth warm.
💛 I am a giant ball of fire.
😎 You need sunglasses to look at me.

cosmos.question: I am round and I go around the sun. You live here! What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 Your house is on me.
🌳 I have lots of green trees.
💧 I have lots of blue water.

cosmos.question: I come out at night, and I'm big and round and sometimes white. What am I?

hints.text: 🐺 Werewolves like me.
🧀 People sometimes say I am made of cheese.
🌚 I help light up the night.

cosmos.question: I am a hot, glowing ball of gas far, far away. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle in the night.
🔭 You need a telescope to see me well.
🔥 The Sun is one of me.

cosmos.question: I am red and rocky. People want to visit me someday! What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 Rockets might go to me.
🏜️ I'm called the Red Planet.
🤖 Robots have driven on me.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of gas, the biggest planet in our solar system. What am I?

hints.text: 🪐 I have a famous red spot.
🌀 I have many moons.
💨 I am made of gas, not rock.

cosmos.question: I have beautiful rings around me. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are made of ice and rock.
🪐 I am a very pretty planet.
🔭 You can see my rings with a telescope.

cosmos.question: I am a group of many stars. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I am very big and far away.
✨ I have names like the Milky Way.
💫 Many stars live together in me.

cosmos.question: I am a small, icy body that sometimes has a tail when I get close to the sun. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I fly around the Sun
🧊 I am made of ice and dust
✨ My tail is made of gas and dust pushed by the Sun.

cosmos.question: I am something that falls from space and burns up in the air, making a bright light. What am I?

hints.text: 🌠 People call me a shooting star.
🔥 I get very hot when I fall.
☄️ I am usually a small piece of rock or metal.

bug.question: I have spots and like to fly. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I have round markings.
🐞 I am a type of beetle.
🌱 I live in the garden.

bug.question: I can fly and make honey. Who am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am the color yellow and black.
🍯 I make something sweet.
🌸 I visit flowers.

bug.question: I march in a line and carry food. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small.
🏠 I live underground.
💪 I am very strong for my size.

bug.question: I jump high and I'm green. Who am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am the color of grass.
🎶 I make a chirping sound.
🌿 I live in the meadow.

bug.question: I wiggle and eat leaves. Then I turn into something pretty. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I crawl before I fly.
🦋 I change into a beautiful insect.
🍃 I eat plants when I'm young.

bug.question: I make a sticky web. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I trap my food.
🕷️ I have eight legs.
🏠 I live in the corner of your room.

bug.question: I fly at night and love light. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌙 I come out when it's dark.
💡 I am attracted to bright things.
🦋 I have wings with powder on them.

bug.question: I light up the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I have a light in my tail.
🌃 You can see me during summer nights.
🔦 I am also called a lightning bug.

bug.question: I have many legs and crawl in the grass. What am I?

hints.text: 💯 I have more than 6 legs.
🐛 I'm long and wiggly.
🪵 You might find me under a log.

bug.question: I make a buzzing sound and like to bite. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I like warm weather.
🩸 I drink blood.
🤕 My bite can be itchy.
